casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Michelle Anita COUSAR. No. 313P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 11, 2008. M. Alexander Charns, Durham, for Cousar. Charles E. Reece, Assistant Attorney General, Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Clark Everett, District Attorney, for State of NC. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 660 S.E.2d 902 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 7th day of July 2008 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th day of December 2008."
